question: What will come in the place of question mark, in this series 2, 7, 14, 23, ?, 47
explanation:
The given series is based on the following pattern :
$latex 2\\xrightarrow{+5}7\\xrightarrow{+7}14\\xrightarrow{+9}23\\xrightarrow{+11}\\underline{34}\\xrightarrow{+13}47$
âˆ´ ? = 34
Hence option [C] is the correct answer
